summary: This module implements a GPU‑accelerated Compressed Sparse Row (CSR) matrix type, offering creation from dense arrays or other sparse formats, and delivering fast arithmetic, indexing, and conversion capabilities on NVIDIA GPUs via CuPy.
business_intent: Enable high‑performance sparse linear algebra on GPUs for scientific computing, data analysis, and machine‑learning applications, reducing execution time compared to CPU‑based sparse matrix libraries.
